Test Piece Contest
Morning Rhapsody
Marine Hall, Fleetwood, Lancashire Prizes - 1st £100 and trophy, 2nd £60 and trophy, 3rd £40 and trophy. Best basses - Rainford. 39th annual contest. 6 bands competed.
